title: One Piece Episode 475 Review Extended Cut

title: Anime Review: One Piece 475
author: Population GO
description: Written review of Episode 475 giving it a 4 out of 5 rating. Highlights the Whitebeard Pirates' grand infiltration of Marineford as the episode's standout moment. Notes concerns about unrealistic teases regarding Luffy fighting the admirals.
